body.name: Brickyard Building Blocks STEM Toys - Educational Building Toys for Kids Ages 4-8 with 163 Pieces, Tools, Design Guide and Toy Storage Box, Gift for Boys & Girls

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Brickyard Building Blocks Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 53 mins
features: 163 PIECES - The more the merrier! Our STEM building educational toy set has enough blocks, wrenches, moveable wheels, nuts, and bolts for up to 4 / 6 kids at one time.
LEARN & PLAY - Let your kid's creativity and imagination run wild! These STEM building toys are ideal for a 4 to 8 year olds, but provide educational fun for all ages.
BOOK OF IDEAS - Spark the creative genius in your child with 42 designs for beginner, intermediate, and advanced builders in our tinker toys guide.
SAFE TO USE - These bright, colorful, non-toxic building blocks for kids ages 4-8 are certified Phthalate, Lead, Cadmium, and BPA-free.
GIFT IDEA - This holiday season, give the gift of learning! Our STEM toys for 5+ year old boys and girls are designed to help boost problem-solving skills, social skills, and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Build with Ease Our building block set features movable wheels and nuts and bolts that click into place with the twist of a wrench or screwdriver. No Sharp Edges Each piece has rounded edges and corners that make it safe for your child to play. They are also washable, making them easy to keep clean. Convenient Storage The clear storage box makes cleanup quick and easy and keeps your rooms free of clutter.

STEM Master 176-pc Stem Kit Set Brickyard Building Blocks 163-pc Stem Kit Set Inspired Thinkers 240-pc Magnetic Letters Set Tiny Conductors 12 Wooden Train Cars Brickyard Building Blocks Baseplate 8Pcs Alphabet Spelling Game Storage Box ✓ ✓ ✓ x x x Idea Booklet ✓ ✓ x x x Spelling Cards Age 3+ 3+ 1+ 3+ 4+ 4+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Gift for 3 year old!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Brickyard Building Blocks STEM Toys, and it's safe to say I'm thoroughly impressed! The 101-piece set provides endless possibilities for creativity and fun, we need to buy another set because their so entertaining!Watching my kid dive into imaginative play with these building blocks has been a so worth it.The Book of Ideas has been a game-changer, offering a wide range of designs suitable for beginners to advanced builders. It's like having a blueprint for endless hours of constructive play.Safety is a top priority for me, and these blocks meet all expectations. Certified as Phthalate, Lead, Cadmium, and BPA-free, I can confidently let my kids explore and build without any worries.Not only do these provide endless entertainment, but they also contribute to the development of problem-solving and social skills. Highly recommended for parents seeking an engaging and educational toy for their litter ones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing! Buy them!
reviews.reviewText: My gs is almost 3. These inspire his creativity. He loves any opportunity to use his tools. The examples are easy. And its a great activity to do together with dad or mom. Small parts are not good for under two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work very well with Lego
reviews.reviewText: My son likes building sets for his stop motions and buying the Lego Creative sets were starting to get a little pricey, so I came on Amazon to see if I could find an alternative that would work with his current Lego sets. All I can say is that these building blocks worked perfect. They snap together with Lego with no problems. They are the correct size and nice bright colors.These work great for my sons needs and were easy on the wallet. 1,000 pieces for the price does not get any better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent source of bulk lego compatible building bricks.
reviews.reviewText: Finding suitable brick construction sources is difficult. With Lego as the largest supply source, and their prices are rather high, and use specialized parts that take quite a bit of imagination to see any way other than what they're intended for(example: a treasure chest was in one Lego set I purchased. The instructions suggested alternative uses such as the head of a frog. The kid playing with that is going to be using a lot of imagination to make that work in their minds). That also means that other brands would need to be compatible in order to be competitive. Other Bulk Block sets fill the set with small parts to pad out the numbers, and have low quality control and pieces that either didn't get enough plastic in the mold to form the part, or at some point half melted. None of that from Brickyard!The pack I purchased from Brickyard has few small pieces(some are included but they're not used for "padding" of the numbers), no flawed pieces that I could find, and a good variety of colors. This is exactly the basic building brick set you want. So far this has been the best bulk building brick set I've purchased from Amazon. Totally compatible, good quality plastic(so far all good tight fits and no stress marks, I can't say about "years of play" from now, but a couple of days entertaining children of relatives is usually quite stressful enough on the toys), excellent quality control, and the right parts to expand your children's building sets to make a full structure instead of the facade usually sold.A minor quibble however: The package states 11 different colors. Technically accurate, but the dark grey color only applies to half of the "roof bricks"(as shown in the images), making it 10 different colors, plus the roof sections(which are either dark grey or red). And if that's the only complaint that can be made, these are worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great building toy
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my 4yo son for Christmas. They were just under $10. These have been a hit. He has been building all kinds of stuff. This is an excellent way to really work fine motor skills and also use critical thinking skills on how and what to build. I got this after looking up toys for a 4yo and saw these were on sale. I was short on gifts for my son compared to my daughters so I just got this on a whim and to ensure he had equal presents. Well I’m glad I got these because they are way better than I expected! They also come in a nice plastic container that closes. I will be recommending these to anyone with a toddler!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great building toy!
reviews.reviewText: This building toy is awesome and is a great gift. It keeps the kids busy, creative, and always so happy to be able to build something new every time. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic building toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought a 163 piece set a year ago. I must have been living under a rock, because I had never seen this type of toy before. My grandson, who loves to put things together, really loves this! He said that his kindergarten teacher has them in her classroom. I feel like it was good luck that I stumbled onto this. They rate right up there with Brio trains, Legos, and Many Melissa and Doug toys. Just terrific! Sturdy too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for building creatives!
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect gift for my nephew. He loves creating things. The brickyard building blocks along with the windows, doors, fence and lamp post kit was the perfect gift and combination. This is only a start to his creativity. It was a bit pricy but way less than original LEGO. It's a great buy for growing creatives. I certainly recommend it. lots of pieces with different functions and very colorful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto completamente de acuerdo a lo pedido.
reviews.reviewText: Lo utiliza mi hijo para su clase de robótica.
My 5 yr old love this. Highly recommended. Great for their creativity.
Best toy I have ever bought for my 2.5 year old son... he loves to create things now...
